=== About Full Circle Weekley News ===

Is a Weekley News Podcast created by Full Circle Magazine Editor Ronnie Tucker (aka: <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/RonnieTucker|RonnieTucker]]</nowiki>), it replaced the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuMagazine/FullCirclePodcast|Full Circle Podcast]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[File:FullCircle-WeeklyNews-Reduced.jpg]]</nowiki>

This all began because I (Ronnie) was looking for a news only podcast for FOSS/Linux/Ubuntu, and found nothing. So, like the fool I am, I thought: why not start one! And here it is. This a weekly roundup of news from Ubuntu and Free Software compiled by Arnfried Walbrecht and read by Ronnie Tucker
